column4: hello Can anybody explain in Ubutnu what does the terminal service client does?
connects to terminal server servers?
it's a solution where many people log into the same computer.. do a little google on it.. it's a well known thing. .many corporations use it
it's not something you want to try if you don't know what it is..
well... close.. but that is if you have the _server_ software.. the terminal server _client_ can only connect to a server and use it.. the server costs money.. big piles of money
you'll have to buy it from Microsoft
sounds like a nice thing.. I don't know of anything similiar for linux/ubuntu.. but there might exist something out there
do you know of any similar programs for windows?.. that's free?
I'll do a little googling.. brb
ah.. I thought I recognized it.... it's a FTP server.. there are plenty of those for linux
I have even used it.. put a little "U" in the task bar
an ftp server will enable you to share files with friends.. and they can upload files to you..  that's about it..
the serv-U software had a little icon in the taskbar on windows.. a little U... green when online.. red when offline
lets see what ubotu says..
you do so.. good luck... oh.. and have a look at the others too
you installed a windows program and it messed up your terminal?
you are running it through wine?
yea.. that's stuff they haven't finished in wine yet.. if the program works it works.. if it doesn't you'll have to wait until they fix it
there are few windows programs that run without any errors at all
if it works.. keep it.. it not.. well.. you might as well install it.. or wait for a new version of wine that perhaps fixes it
but does it work? or it just crashes?... you might want to check appdb.wine.org to see if it's a known application with workarounds etc
